flawed_nl_solution:
3/5th of 20 liters of water is 20*(3/5) = <<20*(3/5)=12>>12 liters
5/6th of 18 liters of vinegar is 18*(5/6) = <<18*(5/6)=108/5>>108/5 liters
12 liters of water mixed with 108/5 liters of vinegar gives 12+108/5 = <<12+108/5=168/5>>168/5-liter mixture
#### 168/5

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 108/5. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
